Posts.Title: Starting Taxol/Herceptin chriskaput chriskaput

Posts.Content: chriskaput wrote: I am starting axol/Herceptin treatments on Monday.  Just completed 4 rounds of AC which was more agressive I am told.  Please let me know if you are on Taxol and how you are feeling.  It will be weekly and I want to know WILL I HAVE ANY GOOD DAYS?  On AC I was on bi-weekly treatment so I had the second week to "recoup"  I have been sick the first 4 days or so with AC.  I hope it's not the same, then I really won;t have many good days!  Dx 3/28/2013, 2cm, Stage IV, mets, ER+, HER2+ Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Starting Taxol/Herceptin chriskaput chriskaput

Posts.Content: Sep 7, 2010 08:23PM chriskaput wrote: Please add me to the list. I started my treatments 5-24-10.  AC x 4 and then Taxol/Herceptin x 12 followed with surgery then radiation for 7 weeks.  Will be on Herceptin for a yr. Just had my 8th round of Taxol/Herceptin today...4 more to go!!!  Cannot wait to be done!! Chris, NY
